Elanthia.description: A kingdom of ancient forests and hidden cities.

Duramark.description: A mountainous kingdom known for its mining and craftsmanship.

Valoria.description: A diverse and populous kingdom with bustling cities.

Korgath.description: A harsh and warlike kingdom in the barren lands.

Sylvaria.description: A peaceful and rural kingdom of rolling hills and farmlands.

Nighthaven.description: A shadowy kingdom hidden in the dark forests.
